name: Stickman Crime: Death Killer - Free Strategy Murder Game
name_original: Stickman Crime: Death Killer - Free Strategy Murder Game
description:
A stickman school, botanical garden, and the museum are full of dangerous,but everyone have been unaware of the danger.
Click on the item to kill stickmans, make it look like an accidentally! Sound's easy? Its not. You have to think to click in patterns to complete each level.
Figure out the correct strategy to kill all of the stickmans.
Remember there is one rule:don't let one see another one die!
Try it now!
